story.book.model

Class StoryModel<V extends StoryView>

  • java.lang.Object
    • story.book.model.StoryModel<V>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - Any object implementing the StoryView interface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Story, StoryFragment

    public abstract class StoryModel<V extends StoryView>
extends java.lang.Object
    Template model class for the application.
    Author:
    Alexander Cheung
    See Also:
    StoryView
